values:
heylo everyone,

Just got home from work and i had a good night. I spent the day with Ben and Jan. Jan showed me how to paint sereamics. *It was at the flea market*. I think that i will hang with them out there for often, because what Jan does is so cool. it's a very good hoppy. *Mesa like it alot ^.^* It also gives me a chance to be with Ben. After all at this point in time in my life I am so glad i have someone like him. 

Then i went home and took a nap. Then i went to work and hung out with Lesli and Jackie. They are pretty cool. i really like them. but god i do not like my boss sam. He yells at me for the dumbest things and it pisses me off. I am thinking about getting a new job because he really pisses me off there.

But oh well that is my story in a day in the life. 

Das ve Danya
Serena

well well well back again and doing great can't wait till saterday. Ben and i are and some other of my friends are going to the anime-con. i was going to drive but mom needs the car so that made me bumed. and we all can't fit in my dads truck. sissy if you reading this, i wish you where here but i know your coming back. hehehe ^.^ got paid tonight and my boss is treating me better after i yelled in his face. for all those who work you know what i mean *kills bosses* my job has asked me to work more but not to much. so i will. more money towards my car. been looking at cars and i think i wanted a van because it can hold more so that makes me happy. a van would be good anyway my boss is letting me off to go camping.for gipson lake here we come ^.^. hiking trails and horse back riding *personal* what a great time where going to have oh by the way im also going to church camp for a week and im going to help with the little kids. that will be a blast. well anyway i guess i will go now.

das ve danya
sarah

heylo today went pretty good. OMG i have changed so much since last month i have turned into a complete bitch when someone makes me mad and god do i get even. ^.^ it was fun to yell at my boss i felt good maybe i should have killed him? lol no i couldn't kill anyone. its aaginst my code of didnity. anywho im going to the anime con this weekend its going to be so cool. but i got to go now das ve danya. 

love sarah

well today went pretty good. and sissy you not alone i feel your pain because i want you to come home right now. ^.^ i really miss you alot and i wish i could see you again. but oneday just remeber. one day we will be free to do what we want and how to live our lives. but neways i think about you all the time and i really badly want to see you. ^.^ in with you always.

heylo, 

i got my braces today and they hurt really bad i told my brother they don't though so he wont panic. lol anyway i hope i get my licnese tomarrow as well. something is telling me that i will. God i miss my sissy so much. i had a nervous break down for the past three days wishing i could see her agian. *SISSY COME HOME* *cries* i really miss you. *sigh* oh well then i hope i can get a costume so i can go to the anime con this year but if not i will try next year and maybe sissy can go with me *starry eyes* wishful thinking *cries more* nayway i will go now byes journal.

love serena

You're Lebanon!
Your room's a mess.  Your house is a mess.  Heck, your life is a mess.  It all used to be really beautiful, and someone even compared you to Paris once, but that's all been replaced with heartache and struggle.  You're small, have been influenced by outsiders for too long, and don't know what to think about religion.  At least you smell rather pleasant!
Take the Country Quiz at the Blue Pyramid

Your Sango! When your not on the field training or
doing sports you are shy and quiet, you do your
homework and always turn it in on time, yet you
are always looking for a bit more from life.

What Inuyasha Character are you?
brought to you by Quizilla

Congrats! Your a Pure Angel! Angels, as far as most
of them go, are all compatabile creatures, but
Pure ones simply are symbols of God. Pure
Angels always appear when a child is born, when
a rainbow is seen, or when someone shares their
first kiss. They never grow old, an can appear
in the shape of a naked woman with white, bold
wings. Pure angels are the carriers of god, and
show their love to everyone in the world.

What Kind of ANGEL are you? (For Girls only) This Quiz has amazingly Beautiful Pictures!
brought to you by Quizilla

heylo,

today was a fun day shippo pulled another fluffy today. *its that little dog the real fluffy gave him.* he caught me on something i said to but ohv well. i went to try and get my drivers test and when i got there they had 10 teacher and 3 students and they only took one so me and the other guy had to leave. i hope i get it soon so i can go and do with my friends all i want. that is the way i wanted my life to be every since i was seven. anywho i guess i will see you later then byes.

well today didn't go as i had hoped....

instead it was torcher... i wish things were not this bad at home. i wish i didn't have to feel pain and anguish al the time every waking min of my life. i want to be happy once for the hole day. a day i know i would never forget. but i might as well keep dreaming nothing goes as i hope for and neither for mom. oh well though. one day i will find a place where nothing will go wrong and everyone would be happy and everyone could laugh and do whatever they want without hurting everyone else. anyway i hope that i can find it one day even if it isn't in this world. bye they way if ben ever reads this i want to let him know he is always and forever  in my heart. i love him and always will. i just want him to know that well good bye lj.

heylo,

well i guess today i have to work although i don't feel like  going i must if i don't want fired. anyway i went to bettys last night. its was fun another night of learning. lol anyway *yawn* im tired. fourth hour is so boring im sitting here with joanna pondering the mysteries of life while she stares at her book of doom. and lauren was talking at the wall today yet again. she is a sweet girl when she wants to be anyway. she told me that roin busted her hand and i hope she is ok. more of my family is dieing yet agian. its hurts to lose someone but lately im so use to seeing someone die in my family that i don't get upset anymore. i mean i know that sounds mean  but i will always love and pray for them. because they where always there for me. im also hoping to get my room changed around with some new furniture. my room is going to be based on moons and stars with chines and japaniess symbols. along with lepaord stuff and things like that. i figure that its best to tell my thoughts here on lj but as for my family my god keep them all safe because soon  wont be here anymore. i will move far away because me and this town bounce energy off each other and i figure that if i can get out of this state or just to a diffrent town then things would be better and i wont feel annoyed all the time. im serious when someone says something to me i just want to hit them and i can't figure out why? well anyway that is just my thought. but i hope i will get over it soon before i feel this way again.

heylo,

ok beleive it or not my boss actually smiled and talked to me today. i have a new name at the restraunt now. its *honey* my boss gave us all nicknames. i got to see sissy's journal *cries* i miss her i wish i could see her again. but no worries i know that within two years we will live together like we promised. i didn't get to see my baby today. but its ok i still think about him all the time. *lol* i love him so much its almost like i can't stand a day not talking to him. mom says if your inlove with someone its like you can't stand not being able to see him every min of your life. i don't know  for sure if that im that far yet in loving him but he is the at most sweetest guys i have ever been with and my grandmas friend betty said im in a good relationship that would last a good long time which i really like. there is no one like him in the world. he is so full of surprises he makes me smile all the time. but anyway. i will update later. 

byes serena

Waaah! You're so LOVABLE! Everybody likes you,
because you're a great person to have around
and it's always happy about everything ^^.
congrats! and...can I hug you?? plz! ^///^

i don't know if anyone can see this but the only true friends i ever had was kathy and ben. im going to break every conection i ever had with any of those morons that ever said they where my friends. people who talk about my family are low down it is something i could never and would never do to them so they can turn there backs on me all they want i don't give a damn anymore. as long as they leave me alone i couldn't care less. 

das ve danya 
serena
heylo everyone i just wanted to say that is my first one i have ever made so bare with me until them byes.
